MUTIS¶

A Python package for the analysis of correlations of light curves and their statistical significance.

  • Workflow of MUTIS (class version)
    • Load data
    • Show data
    • Correlate data
  • PSD tests
    • Using NFT and Lomb-Scargle periodogram.
  • The SIN tests
    • 1. Sinusoidal functions
    • 2. Pulse functions
    • 3. Several pulses, with error
  • Stochastic light curves: Orstein-Uhlenbeck process.
    • Set up parameters
    • Integrate
    • Statistical analysis of the generated curve

Reference/API¶

mutis.correlation.core Module¶

Analysis of correlation of light curves.

Classes¶

Correlation(signal1, signal2, method)

Analysis of the correlation of two signals.

mutis.signal.core Module¶

Synthetic generation of light curves.

Classes¶

Signal(times, signs, method)

Analysis and generation of a signal.
